薪傳.definition: (of knowledge, skill etc) to be passed on from teachers to students, one generation to another, abbr. for 薪盡火傳|薪尽火传[xin1 jin4 huo3 chuan2]

薪火相傳.definition: lit. the flame of a burning piece of firewood passes on to the rest (idiom); fig. (of knowledge, skill etc) to be passed on from teachers to students, one generation to another

薪盡火傳.definition: see 薪火相傳|薪火相传[xin1 huo3 xiang1 chuan2]
